com.googlecode.genericdao.dao.hibernate.original
Class GeneralDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.genericdao.dao.hibernate.HibernateBaseDAO
      com.googlecode.genericdao.dao.hibernate.original.GeneralDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeneralDAO
public class GeneralDAOImpl
extends HibernateBaseDAO
implements GeneralDAO

Implementation of GeneralDAO using Hibernate. The SessionFactory property is annotated for automatic resource injection.

Author:
dwolverton
